title: Context Receipt
description: A receipt for a governed context compaction or transformation event.

id.description: Unique identifier for this receipt (e.g., UUID or hash-based ID).

input_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the input context before transformation.

output_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the output context after transformation.

version.description: The version of the model or service.

reasoning_effort.description: The reasoning effort level configured for this transformation.

signature.description: Cryptographic signature of the receipt contents.
